dcterms:creator: Alexander Hicks
Kamil Akhuseyinoglu

Peter Brusilovsky
dcterms:description: CodeCorpus was developed with the goal of understanding how learners explain code. It consists of pairs of code snippets accompanied by expert explanations and explanations given by students/non-experts for ten different code examples.
dcterms:title: CodeCorpus
